title: 2/1 w/ Office/Den. ALL Pets Allowed. In-Unit W/D. Amazing Area.
posting_body: Description: Beautiful and spacious (1,020sqft) 2-bed/1-bath with an office/den apartment in a recently completely renovated property on the edges of Humboldt Park and Ukranian Village, walkable to MANY restaurants, night life, CTA, beautiful and large Humboldt Park, and more.
Bright rooms with great wind flow and lots of light along with recently updated fixtures including a brand-new DISHWASHER and IN-UNIT WASHER/DRYER.
Large kitchen with plenty of counter space and cabinets.
Large bedrooms can fit queen comfortably or king to be cozy.
Back porch available for storage and usage.
Both front and back yards and will be available for grilling, parties, pets, and enjoying the sun.
ALL TYPES OF ANIMALS ALLOWED, NO RESTRICTIONS.
Responsive and modern-era property owner/landlord.
All the things you've heard and experienced about bad landlords do not apply here.
No agents, please.
Screening Form: If you are interested in our unit, please fill out the screening form at https://apply.propertiesbymcg.com or text/call the listed number.
If we are interested and the unit is still available, we will reach out to you about scheduling a showing and then officially filing an application.
By filling out this screening form, there are zero guarantees being made.
NOTE:
Application will require a background and credit check that has a cost of $39 paid directly to company providing services by the applier.
Approval Criteria: Gross Income 3x Rent Minimum; 700+ Credit Score; No Prior Evictions;
No Prior Legally Disallowed Felonies; and Good References.
Move-In Fee: NO SECURITY DEPOSIT.
$350 move-in fee for 1st person and $150 per each additional person.

Pets (any animal which can leave a cage and roam free): All pets must go through a PetScreening.com check; Pet Addendum agreed to with lease signing; $250 nonrefundable fee at initial lease signing; and $25/month increase in rent per pet.
